name: taina
description: A block theme for WordPress & Tainacan.

scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/style.scss style.css
scripts.compile-styles-tainacan: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/tainacan.scss tainacan.css
scripts.build-theme: npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify
scripts.build-tainacan: npm run compile-styles-tainacan && npm run css-minify-tainacan
scripts.build: npm run build-theme && npm run build-tainacan

author: wetah
